website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Chromebook 314 is a return to the principles that made Chromebooks so appealing to many people when they first arrived. You won’t find expensive displays, quad-core processors or touchscreens here, but what you have is a cheap device with excellent battery life that can help kids do their homework, families organise their lives, and pretty much all the basics that most people want most of the time. It’s also lightweight and acts like a proper laptop rather than some weird hybrid. Old-school, with modern aesthetics and performance.
cons: No touchscreen, average display, occasional streaming glitches

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: With the lockdown situation I needed a decent laptop for my daughter but didn’t wanna pay a fortune, she didn’t mind the make and after reading the review on here it sounded like just what I was looking for! Didn’t disappoint and great value for money! Very happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: kirsty

customer_reviews.title: amazing value great batery life
customer_reviews.text: what a great little chrombook ,love the linux based os , run nice and snappy great screen and speakers are pretty good once you download a good eq app... stuck in a 256gb micro sd and im sorted, easily lasts all day. for all you mupetts comparing these to a win10 laptop, thats not the point its horses for courses these are great for youtube and web browsing and office work.... not at all suited for games etc.... there is a clue in the name.... its a chromebook the keyboard is also very good.... stop wining it wont run windows apps... of course it cant you idiots..
customer_reviews.author: Paul at the Steampacket Inn Knottingley

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is fantastic for my needs. It has excellent battery life, is quick to load up and is compatible with the apps that I use on Play Store. I use mine for university work, streaming and video calls and it's fine for that. Certain apps don't work (iFollow, Now TV) but a lot do. The only downside to this chromebook is that you are restricted to online usage, however a lot of Google Docs have since become available offline. It is a brilliantly priced product (this is my second chromebook by Acer) but only buy it if you're not tied to Windows/Apple services/can work online.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rose

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received a faulty item. It worked well for 3 weeks, then stopped. I was ready to return it, but it suddenly started working again, and I decided to keep it. However, a week into it, it stopped working again (wouldn't switch on). Returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Would give it half a star . If you re used with a Windows laptop , this is definately not for you , the chromebook OS fails at almost anything you can usually do on a Windows 10 laptop , did nt meet at all my requirements , poor image quality , poor web cam quality , is nt compatible with most apps (You can t watch Now Tv on it for ex) , not suitable for gaming or streaming , could even use it for a Skype interview as I did nt know that it can t take screenshots . Nice design , yet very poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Militaru

customer_reviews.title: Cracking laptop.. fabulous all round!
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. can't fault it in anyway! Super fast, long battery life..
customer_reviews.author: Peskyrabbitt

customer_reviews.title: LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: This item was not for me it was a special gift for my granddaughter, so I can pass on what she as told me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chrome book for my mother. She’s been using it for a week now. She tells me she’s very pleased with it. Just what she needed for surfing the web, you tube, WhatsApp etc. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Craigalbutt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Present for my grandson who is using it for college
customer_reviews.author: nrs s richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very much like the size and weight of it. Quick to start up and use. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R L Edwards

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a proper look at the spec, but this laptop hasn't got windows on, and I could only download more basic version of Open Office for it, keyboard hasn't got 'Caps Lock' and a lot of other buttons It's cheap, but get what you pay for, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Walker

customer_reviews.title: I use it for writing class, & the speaker is brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing. I love it. If only we could get Better Internet now, 😉👍
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: What's the point in having a laptop, only had it a few hours and it's crashed and the space button is faulty. You're lucky, I have a wireless keyboard, won't be buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: adam fawcett

customer_reviews.title: A simple laptop
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and good price and simple and straight forward laptop
customer_reviews.author: Herbert and Wendy Klein

customer_reviews.title: Awful Delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came home to see the laptop dumped next to my bins despite me opting for it not to be left in any ‘safe’ place. Let’s hope it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: average product
customer_reviews.text: ok product, had problems with off on button. not going to buy acer products again
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: this product is perfect for all my needs at home x
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love Chromebooks!
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift. Was not dissappointed. If you've used chrombox before, this will not disappoint. Slightly heavier than previous chromebooks, but this is 14Inch, which justifies the weight. Simply put your gmail account in, and its ready to rock and roll! Quick - start up in seconds, updates take mins. Greta value of money. Would recommend product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Still can't believe how light this laptop is. The other bonuses are the speed of updates and of charging with amazing duration between charges. There are some little things missing, like delete and home/end buttons, but overall it is so very easy to use and carry - suits my fairly undemanding requirements very well and at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: rodah

customer_reviews.title: Great build but poor display
customer_reviews.text: Returned this almost immediately the screen was really poor for watching anything on. Build quality was great just a shame the screen has let it down
customer_reviews.author: MR JOHN PHILIP CHANDLER

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for money - Perfect for working on the go - Not the best for watching videos/movies
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value for money, my main device is a Razer Blade which I sometimes use to game but I have rarely felt disappointed about having the Chromebook on me rather than the Razer. Only slightly annoyance is that the screen gets dark when you view it from the side so it isn't the best for a Netflix sesh.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Wade

customer_reviews.title: Looks.ok
customer_reviews.text: I have given.a.random rating as.i bought it for a Christmas present. I will update this review in due time
customer_reviews.author: adrian heginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sixth Former
customer_reviews.text: Does everything my Daughter needs, small enough but also at 14" screen big enough to use all day too

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: My first Chromebook after using iPad for years. Easy to set up and use. Really good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs PM Heseltine

customer_reviews.title: Best netbook
customer_reviews.text: Best I have ever had. Easy to use, strong sturdy, great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Kateknight

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my two kids and it very good for there school work. Very quick start up and shutdowns, battery life is good. Had them a couple of month and have hot no problems and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MR Shaw

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent robust tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool and easy to use has made me a big fan.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Found the product very easy to use. Did a lot of research on chromebooks, before making my decision!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Padgham

customer_reviews.title: Ecxellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chromebook, went from an 11" model to 14"and this is an excellent device. Meets all my needs and a very good machine. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sniper2

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook 314 CB314-H - (Intel Celeron N4000, 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, 14 inch HD display, Chrome OS, Silver)
product_meta.description: Style Name:HD Display, 32GBDesigned for working in bright-light conditions the large 14 inch display of the Acer Chromebook 314 is ideal for good productivity With a long battery life a fast Intel CPU and fast Wi-Fi 5 connection it gets users online in an instant Low power usage and responsive software are provided by the latest Intel processor The extra performance makes highly graphical classroom projects run smoother so tasks are performed quicker The large 14 inch display with an anti-glare coating gives users a good workspace so they can be more productive in bright conditions 12 5 hours of battery life goes a long way With just a single charge get in a full day’s work with time to spare The powerful long lasting battery means you don’t have to take the power adapter with you A strong consistent wireless signal is provided by Intel Gigabit Wi-Fi and the strategically placed Wi-Fi 5 (802 11ac) wireless antenna with 2x2 MU-MIMO MU-MIMO (Multi-User Multiple-Input and Multiple-Output) is a standard that offers faster wireless speeds and can handle more wireless devices at once Two USB Type-C ports for ultra-quick data transfer video streaming and battery charging The reversible USB 3 1 Type-C connector is the same at both ends and on both sides so it’s easy to attach USB 3 1 is 10 times faster than USB 2 0 In addition to the two USB 3 1 Type-C ports there are also two USB 3 0 Type A ports and a micro SD slot Fast boot times ease of use tough security and a long battery life are some of the advantages of Chrome OS With a boot time of about 8 seconds you’ll start working quicker the simplified interface makes it easy to learn integrated malware protection stops viruses in their tracks and finally an efficient use of power means you can work all day without your power adapter
feature_bullets: Fast boot times ease of use tough security and a long battery life are some of the advantages of Chrome OS
Designed for working in bright-light conditions the large 14 inch display of the Acer Chromebook 314 is ideal for greater productivity
Low power usage and responsive software are provided by the latest Intel processor
12 5 hours of battery life goes a long way With just a single charge get in a full day’s work with time to spare
Two USB Type-C ports for ultra-quick data transfer video streaming and battery charging
